page.title: 02PARADISE FARM
page.content: Our class went for a visit to Katie Potter's farm.We all went in cars.When we got there Mr. Potter was loading up two lorries with his grain.It was going to the docks and it might go to Ethiopia.He had a huge pile of grain about 300 tons all in one of his barns.We were allowed to play on the tractors_one was a John Deere.We sat in agreat big combine harvester and played with all the controls.Mrs. Potter showed us the cows.She had 70 cows, some were brown and some were black.I liked seeing their tongues.We saw some sheep but when we got close to them they all ran away and Katie chased them down the field.
